ptxt.intxrefpoff: Generator Removal and Installation:J24B and N32A

s1.ptxt: Using ohmmeter (1), check for continuity between slip rings (2) of rotor. If there is no continuity, replace rotor.

spec.title: Standard resistance between slip rings of rotor

s1.ptxt: Using ohmmeter (1), check that there is no continuity between slip ring (2) and rotor core (3). If there is continuity, replace rotor.
Check slip rings and rotor fan surface for roughness or scoring. If they are rough or scored, replace rotor.

servinfosub.title: Bearing
servinfosub.ptxt: If abnormality is found, replace bearing.

s1.ptxt: Using ohmmeter (1), check continuity between all pairs of leads (2) and continuity between all pairs of leads (3).
If there is no continuity, replace stator.
Using ohmmeter (1), check continuity between the following terminals.
Check continuity in both direction by interchanging the probes.
Stator is normal if there is continuity only in one direction.
If there is no continuity or there is continuity in both direction, replace stator.
Using ohmmeter (1), check continuity between all pairs of leads (2). If there is no continuity between any lead pairs, replace stator.
Using ohmmeter (1), check that there is no continuity between any of coil leads (2) and stator core (3). If there is continuity, replace stator.

topic.title: N32A
topic.ptxt: Check each brush for wear by measuring its length as shown.
Replace brush, if it is worn down to service limit.

topic.title: J24B
topic.ptxt: Check each brush for wear visually.
Replace brush, if it is worn down close to wear limit line (1).

topic.title: N32A

attention2.ptxt: Rectifier cannot be inspected individually as it is included in stator assembly.

topic.ptxt: For stator inspection, refer to Stator .

s1.ptxt: Using ohmmeter, check continuity between the following terminals.
Check continuity in both directions by interchanging the probes.
Rectifier is normal if there is continuity only in one direction.
If there is no continuity or there is continuity in both directions, replace rectifier.
